Texts.Chs: 通过阅读历史文献，我们发现了一个惊人的事实: 古人是一种人造种族，它们由充满生命力的石头构成，经常作为哨兵驻扎。我们不能确定是谁或者是什么造就了他们，但是我们百分之百确定他们不是凭空出现的。不，这些石头巨人是手工建造的，目的是复制自己，保护他们的创造者。
Texts.Eng: Reading through historical documents has revealed an astonishing truth: The Ancients were an artificial race, built from energized stone and often stationed as sentries. We can't be sure who or what made them, but we are one hundred percent certain they did not simply come about from nowhere. No, these stone goliaths were built by hand, designed to replicate themselves and protect their creators.

Texts.Chs: 古代传说中令人惊奇的发现
我们甚至在这些文本中找到了蓝图的原型。这简直是破格的认知改变！我们对这些神秘生物的整个看法已经颠倒过来了。当然现在还有一个更大的问题: 他们去了哪里？
Texts.Eng: We even found prototype blueprints in these texts. This is a huge game changer! Our entire view on these mysterious beings has been flipped upside down. Now a greater question remains... where did they go?
